description: The ruling coalition implodes with no clear way forward, as the pandemic prevents new elections.
title: Coronavirus row helps topple Kosovo government
title_page: Coronavirus row helps topple Kosovo government - BBC News
maintext: Such voters will see the demise of Mr Kurti's government as a stitch-up orchestrated by an old guard uniting to protect their mutual interests. They are unlikely to be forgiving when they get their next opportunity at the ballot box.
